snippet.title: AI War 2: Relaunched Kickstarter is LIVE!
snippet.description:
This is just a teaser video, apologies.  That said, we're at almost 48% of our funding goal after the first 3.5 hours.  Incredible!  Please help us start smashing some stretch goals. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/arcengames/ai-war-ii-0/

This is a sequel to the award-winning, genre breaking, asymmetric strategy cult classic. Win against the odds in AI War 2!
